mapper.select: select commentId, boardNo, writer, `text`, created_at as createdAt from `comment` where boardNo=#{boardNo} order by commentId asc
mapper.insert: insert into `comment`(board_no, writer, `text`, created_at) values(#{boardNo}, #{writer}, #{text}, NOW())
mapper.delete: delete from `comment` where boardNo=#{boardNo} and commentId=#{commentId}
mapper.update: update `comment` set `text`=#{text} where boardNo=#{boardNo} and commentId=#{commentId}
